ISSUE.TITLE: False Posivitives related to C code
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Is it common to received false positives on .IPA files coded in Swift? I have a string of vulnerabilities being reported for Library functions associated with C code even thought no C code is in use.. Is this a known issue?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow columns to resize more easily

COMMIT.MESSAGE: updated time to utc based on timezone to fix bug #215

Third party submission: Bug fixes (#149) * API submission support. New admin page skeleton. * Added admin page Backlog item 243 * added mock data for api keys as well as dummy buttons * Adding ApiKeys model class * Basic underlying support for creating an API key * Basic support for creating an API key * Set ap;ikeys to be retrieved and displayed on the admin page * adjusted view to display actual text for the role and added *** to the api key prefix display. * Fixed create_api_key bug * Adding skeleton of New API Key modal * built out the skeleton for new api key, added a few needed functions * added sso_email to default notify value in form * fixed functionality of the create api html page * fixed swal function and adjusted text (added copy function) * added in revoke API button functionality * Adding ApiKeys.ID column as primary key * Adding REVOKED_DATE an related behavior * added rekey feature * set default expiry date to 90 days * API access control layer * Bug fixes * API uploads now use email from API key * Adding basic support for filtering recent scans * added security_score to completed scan. * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing backslash * Fixed spelling error * Ignore "lief" * Need to keep Django version <4.2.0 for Aurora * switched rekey to edit key and edited functionality to support edit * Lint fixes * Fixed trailing space * Item 247: add in prepopulation functionality * Item 247: cleanup formating and removed debug item * Removed / from recent_scans redirect * FULL_ACCESS handling * Fixed bug with cyberspect_scan_id response * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing tests using custom header * Removing HTTP_X_MOBSF_API_KEY tests * Adding CZ100 access control logic * Lint fixes * Upload page UI changes * Fixed bug in api_rescan if hash not found * Fixed spelling * fixed Add API key copy behavior * fixed close issue with edit modal * force page to reload from server when editing to fix caching issue * Allow columns to resize more easily * updated time to utc based on timezone to fix bug #215 * fixed behavior of edit api functionality * Title update * Lint fixes --------- Co-authored-by: nadrian <nadrian@syslogicinc.com> Co-authored-by: Brice Williams <brice@cyberspect.com>

Third party submission: Dependencies button (#150) * API submission support. New admin page skeleton. * Added admin page Backlog item 243 * added mock data for api keys as well as dummy buttons * Adding ApiKeys model class * Basic underlying support for creating an API key * Basic support for creating an API key * Set ap;ikeys to be retrieved and displayed on the admin page * adjusted view to display actual text for the role and added *** to the api key prefix display. * Fixed create_api_key bug * Adding skeleton of New API Key modal * built out the skeleton for new api key, added a few needed functions * added sso_email to default notify value in form * fixed functionality of the create api html page * fixed swal function and adjusted text (added copy function) * added in revoke API button functionality * Adding ApiKeys.ID column as primary key * Adding REVOKED_DATE an related behavior * added rekey feature * set default expiry date to 90 days * API access control layer * Bug fixes * API uploads now use email from API key * Adding basic support for filtering recent scans * added security_score to completed scan. * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing backslash * Fixed spelling error * Ignore "lief" * Need to keep Django version <4.2.0 for Aurora * switched rekey to edit key and edited functionality to support edit * Lint fixes * Fixed trailing space * Item 247: add in prepopulation functionality * Item 247: cleanup formating and removed debug item * Removed / from recent_scans redirect * FULL_ACCESS handling * Fixed bug with cyberspect_scan_id response * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing tests using custom header * Removing HTTP_X_MOBSF_API_KEY tests * Adding CZ100 access control logic * Lint fixes * Upload page UI changes * Fixed bug in api_rescan if hash not found * Fixed spelling * fixed Add API key copy behavior * fixed close issue with edit modal * force page to reload from server when editing to fix caching issue * Allow columns to resize more easily * updated time to utc based on timezone to fix bug #215 * fixed behavior of edit api functionality * Title update * Lint fixes * added lookup to CypberspectScan and added to link on RecentScans website. * Disabling Dependencies button * Searching updates * Bug fixes --------- Co-authored-by: nadrian <nadrian@syslogicinc.com> Co-authored-by: Brice Williams <brice@cyberspect.com>

functionality of the create api html page * fixed swal function and adjusted text (added copy function) * added in revoke API button functionality * Adding ApiKeys.ID column as primary key * Adding REVOKED_DATE an related behavior * added rekey feature * set default expiry date to 90 days * API access control layer * Bug fixes * API uploads now use email from API key * Adding basic support for filtering recent scans * added security_score to completed scan. * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing backslash * Fixed spelling error * Ignore "lief" * Need to keep Django version <4.2.0 for Aurora * switched rekey to edit key and edited functionality to support edit * Lint fixes * Fixed trailing space * Item 247: add in prepopulation functionality * Item 247: cleanup formating and removed debug item * Removed / from recent_scans redirect * FULL_ACCESS handling * Fixed bug with cyberspect_scan_id response * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Removing tests using custom header * Removing HTTP_X_MOBSF_API_KEY tests * Adding CZ100 access control logic * Lint fixes * Upload page UI changes * Fixed bug in api_rescan if hash not found * Fixed spelling * fixed Add API key copy behavior * fixed close issue with edit modal * force page to reload from server when editing to fix caching issue * Allow columns to resize more easily * updated time to utc based on timezone to fix bug #215 * fixed behavior of edit api functionality * Title update * Lint fixes * added lookup to CypberspectScan and added to link on RecentScans website. * Disabling Dependencies button * Searching updates * Bug fixes * Lookup app info enhancements * UI tweaks * Removing "again" from message * added form validation for API keys * Form validation * Validation bug fixes * Lint fixes * Lint fixes * Set maxlength * Open DependencyTrack in a new tab * Added links for Postman files * Lowercase upload only * Hiding ADMIN link from non-admins * Hint updates * Allow case insensitive searching * Spelling fix * Updated formatting. Fixed modal bug. * Bug fix: populate multiple countries * Disabled Dependencies button color * Fixed logging issues and Safari upload bug * Bypassing load_result * Better fix * Undo Postgres settings * Undoing Postgres DB by default * is_admin fixes * Fix non-admin upload bug --------- Co-authored-by: nadrian <nadrian@syslogicinc.com> Co-authored-by: Brice Williams <brice@cyberspect.com>
